alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Phillips and northwestern Valley Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 624 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Whitewater to 22 miles southwest of Fourchette. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Whitewater, Saco, Dodson, Fourchette, Loring, Port Of Morgan, Phillips, Sleeping Buffalo, Wagner, Frenchman Reservoir, Thoeny, Content, Sun Prairie and Bowdoin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Southwest Phillips
